tool_description: Access a suite of over 20 filters and mask options to change the mood in an instant with Picsart’s Filters API
name: Picsart - Effects
title: Picsart - Effects

api_list.name: /effects
api_list.description:
**Service Description:**
  This service retrieves a list of supported effects.

**Authorization:**
    Requires an API key to be provided in the **X-Picsart-API-Key** request header.

**cURL:** Use this file [GetEffects.sh](https://picsart.io/files/api-samples-curl-GetEffects.sh) for cURL samples.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://picsart-effects.p.rapidapi.com/effects"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "picsart-effects.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://picsart-effects.p.rapidapi.com/effects"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "picsart-effects.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
